title: Minyas' Daughters Refuse to Recognize the God Bacchus (Les Filles de Minyas refusent de reconnaître le dieu Bacchus) from Les Métamorphoses
medium: Etching from an illustrated book with 30 etchings
dimensions: composition (irreg.): 9 x 6 3/4" (22.8 x 17.2 cm); page: 12 5/8 x 10 1/4" (32 x 26 cm)
